title: Add Figma design link to navigation

requirements.text: Add a navigation link to https://formal-trend-62662413.figma.site in the Nav component that opens in a new tab
acceptanceCriteria: The link appears in the main navigation menu alongside existing links
Clicking the link opens https://formal-trend-62662413.figma.site in a new browser tab
The link is visible on both desktop and mobile navigation views

constraints: Maintain existing navigation structure and styling patterns
Follow the existing pattern used for the Reflect & Create external link in Nav.tsx
nonGoals: Changing the overall navigation layout or design
Adding authentication requirements to the link
